title: Distribution of molecular speeds for four gases

content.description: The curves in the figure represent the distribution of the molecular speeds for the gases <math alttext="H 2" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msub> </math>, <math alttext="O 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="N 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="C H 4" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>CH</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math> at the same temperature.
content.question: Which curve corresponds to the distribution for <math alttext="C H 4" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>CH</mi> <mn>4</mn> </msub> </math>?

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
